text:
Hi,

it would be great, if the <style> task would have the option to add
an external catalog resolver. E.g. one, that is capeable to resolve 
xml-catalog files (http://wwws.sun.com/software/xml/developers/resolver/
or http://xml.apache.org/commons/dist/resolver-1.0.jar).

This may be a duplicate to report 'http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.
cgi?id=15853'.

Usage for using an external catalog resolver is described under
'http://www.sagehill.net/docbookxsl/UseCatalog.html'.
creator: skripi@mail2003.shadowbyte.net

text: There is support for this in ant1.6. Do you find it doesnt work for you?
creator: stevel@apache.org
